title: This Trailer For Britney Spears' Unauthorized Made-For-TV Biopic Is EVERYTHING! Watch HERE!!!
text:
The first trailer for Britney Spears's 'Lifetime' Biopic movie. It airs on February 18th. pic.twitter.com/wBekM9GvUZ
— Pop Crave (@PopCravings) January 22, 2017
OMG YE
That (above) is the first trailer for Britney Spears ' made-for-tv biopic movie set to appear on Lifetime soon, and we Can. Not. Wait.
Best 28 seconds ever??
Well, until February 18th, that is…
That's right! February 18th is the big day; it debuts that night at 8:00 p.m. ET — will U be watching???
